Title: The Pest
Writer: David Bar Katz (story), John Leguizamo (story), David Bar Katz (screenplay)
Actors: John Leguizamo, Jeffrey Jones, Freddy Rodríguez, Pat Skipper
Plot: Miami scam artist Pest Vargas is on the run from the Scottish mob and a German headhunter, the mob after 50,000 dollars, the German guy after his head. Pest dons many disguises in an attempt to evade their clutches.
